title: Developing Science Leadership Competencies through Formative Assessment and Critical Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Emphasizing scientific problem-solving competencies in VR simulation environments using learners' individual devices

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to critically analyze complex problems in scientific fields through CHAT-based challenge tasks
Learners continuously execute self-directed improvements during project implementation using formative assessment feedback

Learners will design a science-based decision-making process using corporate collaboration platforms (e.g., Slack, Microsoft Teams) within six months and establish a collaborative activity system that achieves a team goal attainment rate of 80% or higher.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
